1.content:
Dan groaned and rolled around under his thin sheets during the night, the heat of the summer evening was not helping him even though all his windows were open and a faint breeze of warm air circulated the teen's bedroom.

There was a flash of light for the briefest of moments before Dan's eyes opened and stared out at a glowing red orb floating at the foot of his bed.

"GREETINGS MORTAL CHILD". The glowing orb spoke, but the voice was only heard inside Dan's mind, even through it sounded load and threatening.

"W...w...what do you want, what are you?" Dan stuttered, suddenly unnerved by the glowing orb.
"YOU NEED NOT FEAR ME BOY, I COME WITH AN OFFER". The voice said, easing and becoming a much less intimidating force.

"A....an offer?", He was becoming a lot more relaxed now as the orb floated a little closer, looming over his young crotch.
"I OFFER YOU THE POWER TO CHANGE THE SIZE OF ANYTHING AROUND YOU, BE IT LIVING OR INANIMATE".

The struck a real tone with young Dan, who had been interested in science and magic for years, ever since he got into playing Dungeons and Dragons and Magic the Gathering with his friends. The boy thought about it a moment before simply nodding his head.

At this the orb glowed a dark green and fired a sharp beam of green light right into Dan's bare chest, illuminating all of his organs and bones inside his chest. He suddenly felt powerful, as the energy transfer finished, the orb vanished and his chest returned to normal and the boy fell back asleep.

The next morning he woke up with a start and rubbed his head and looked down at his chest, pressing it around his nipples and they got erect before he sighed. "Could it be?"

He then grinned and licked his lips eagerly "What to test this on?"
1.title: Power Bestowed

choices: Dan slowly removes a shoe and sock
11.content:
One name entered Dan's head: Ben Darry. He grinned and got dressed in his old clothes from the previous day, which had been just as hot and sweaty as this day was about to be.

Bringing his old socks up to his face and taking a deep sniff, Dan cringed but nodded in approval before slipping them on his size 10 feet. Dan already had a few ideas for Ben, who was Dan and his best friend Paul's most hated and feared enemy.

Ben would frequently pick on Dan and Paul simply because of their interests in videogames and things like Dungeons and Dragons. It didn't help that most of the school staff turned a blind eye, including the principal Mr. Barron. Dan scowled as he pulled on a pit stained t-shirt, Keith Barron would definitely be shrunk sometime in the near future.

It was still quite early, the school bus wouldn't be here for at least another half hour or so...Dan might as well get some breakfast.

Some time later the school bus picked Dan up in front of his house, Dan stepped inside and sat next to Paul. "Whaddya look so happy for?" Paul inquired curiously.

Dan giggled, "Let's just say things are looking better than they have for us in awhile..." he said cryptically.

Paul sniffed the air and teasingly shoved Dan's shoulder, "Dude is that you I'm smellin'?"

Dan grinned smugly, "Yup, same clothes from yesterday..."

"Dude, gross! Why?" Paul laughed.

"It's a secret..." Dan chuckled.

When the bus arrived at school, Dan made it a point to part ways with Paul and seek out Ben Darry..who of course was picking on someone near the lockers.

"Hey, Ben!" Dan exclaimed as Darry turned and spotted him..just as he was shoving some poor kid into the locker.

"What do YOU want, nerd?! I'm busy!" Ben snapped.

"I've got something to show you." Dan said with a lick of his lips. "Oh yeah? Hmph, this better be good or I'll pound you!" Ben growled as he followed Dan into the boys restroom.

Thankfully it was deserted and nobody else had seen them enter or talk to one another...perfect.

"Well? What do you-" Ben said impatiently...until a bright light shot out of Dan's fingertips and he suddenly found himself looking face to face with Dan's ratty old sneakers.

Dan put his hands on his hips and grinned in smug superiority down at his prey. Ben looked up and saw Dan looming over him, he instantly began to scream bloody murder as Dan snatched him up and took him in to one of the stalls.
11.title: Ben Darry

choices: Ben between his toes for class
Ben under his heel for class
There is a familiar knock on the stall door
111.content:
Dan sat himself down on the toilet as he locked the stall door behind him, grinning as Ben's tiny screams could barely be heard outside the thin walls of the completely secure stall.

Ben was shaking even more now as this was still a massive shock to him, still fully clothed, he felt even more vulnerable and scared now than any other time in his young teenage life. Looking up at this kid he used to bully made it even worse as Dan so casually lifted one of his ratty sneakers onto his knee.

"You have no idea how long i have waited for this moment do you little runt, and now its finally come". He said, the grin on his face only grew bigger as he held the tiny teen above his sneaker as he removed it, the potent scent of teenage boy feet filled his nose, burning his eyes and making him retch in disgust.

"Oh you don't like how my feet small do you, well tough shit you little pussy". Dan snapped, feeling amazed at how a little shift in size would mean a big power shift. Ben wriggled, unable to block the smell entering his nose and throat, he gagged and coughed at the thick boyish scent.

The sneaker fell down onto the bathroom floor with a slight bang and it revealed his sock, that used to be white, but was now irreversibly stained with thick yellow splotches around the heel, ball and toes of his foot., Ben gasped at the state of the sock and he felt sick looking at it.

"Fucking hell dude, when did you wash your socks?' He spat out at Dan while the younger teen just smiled so casually, moving the tiny boy closer and rubbing him against the well worn fabric of the sweat soaked sock.

This only made Dan grin even more as his index finger dug into the opening of his sock and began to slowly pull it down, exposing more of his well formed size 10 bare foot. Ben went pale and white as a ghost as he watched this and saw the toes being exposed and the smell only getting worse as sock lint was plastered over the boy's titanic toes.

"Oh my god, that feels so much better, they have been on my socks for like an hour". Dan mentioned, which only horrified Ben even more, as this amount of funk and sweat was only from an hours worth of being worn.

Dan rubbed his chin and smirked.....
111.title: A mile in another's shoes

choices: Dan and Paul have History Class
Dan and Paul hangout before first bell
1111.content:
"Hmmmm..." Dan said thoughtfully as he spread his toes to reveal quite the amount of grimy lint and funk globbed between his young crevices. "Oh! Looks like I've got a nice amount of jam!" Dan licked his lips and chuckled in delight, holding Ben dangerously close to the spread digits.

Ben gagged at the sight and smell, the lint was discolored and had obviously been building up for days on end. "Y-You disgusting nerd! Don't you wash?!" Ben retched, still managing to be a bully even at such a helpless size.

Dan grinned smugly, "It's been too hot to take a shower...what can I say? And I don't like changing my socks." The titanic boy giggled a bit as he slowly advanced Ben toward his big toe crevice.

"W-what are you doing?!" Ben yelped as he began to squirm fearfully.

"Oh...just putting you where you belong." Dan grinned widely and stuffed Ben into that disgusting sludge.

Ben's first response was to scream and wiggle around, but this only caused Dan to groan in satisfaction at feeling his longtime enemy writhe in agony against his plump toes.

"Mmmm..that's right, squirm for me." Dan licked his lips as he stuffed Ben deeper and deeper into his horrid built up toe funk. After he was satisfied that Ben was secured and in complete discomfort, he began to pull that rancid sock on again.

When Ben realized the gross and horrible fabric was being pulled on over him, he renewed his struggles. Dan licked his lips, "Yeaah...you're gonna be in my sock and my shoe throughout the day. It's gonna be sooo FUNKY for you!" Dan giggled before pulling the sock on tight and popping his shoe back on.

Soon after tying up his laces, he wandered out into the hall where he met Paul.

"You alright? I was worried Ben got you or somethin'!" Paul said worriedly.

Dan couldn't help but chuckle, "No...not quite. Let's head to class."

Paul couldn't put his finger on it, but his best pal seemed a lot more confident and upbeat than he usually was at school.
1111.title: Ben between his toes for class

11112.content:
Paul seemed amazed at how suddenly confident Dan had become but it just made him smile even more as they went into the gym and saw Harris Blackwood, their gym coach and the bane of their young existence.

"Look what the cat dragged in, you two losers can start by doing 5 laps of the gym, MOVE IT". Harris boomed as Dan and Paul looked at each other, but Dan seemed so calm as he just winked at Paul as they began to jog around the large gym hall.

Inside the young teen's shoe and sock, Ben was having one hell of a trip, plastered with thick teenage toejam and sock lint that had clearly not been cleaned out in some time, he thrashed as he felt the giant foot moving and slamming into the insole much harder and faster.

"O...OH God, not a jog". he stuttered to himself, gagging as the heat of the teenager's foot made the toes around him sweat, coating him in a thick layer of boy foot sweat the SMELL burned his nose as he struggled.

Dan could not help but chuckle a little to himself as he and Paul jogged around the gym, while the rest of the class so casually got told that they would be playing dodge-ball today and a few mocking snickers were made towards the two nerd as they ran. "You'll pay for that". Dan muttered under his breath as he felt Ben trapped between his long boyish toes with each stide he took, but soon both boy were getting tired and dripping with sweat.

Inside the boy's shoe and sock Ben knew all too well that the physical exertion was taking a toll on the giant boy that enslaved him. "pl....please let me out". he shouted as loud as he could, before being forced to inhale the foul stench of the fresh sweat and the unwashed sock and foot all around him, gagging on the smell.

"Ho...how can we pla.....play dodge-ball after......after this?' Paul said, gasping for air and dripping with fresh sweat as they both finished their laps and saw the rest of their classmates taking up their positions. Paul looked at Dan and noticed the confidence again and could see his best friend's toes wriggling and curling inside his shoe, tormenting his tiny slave that no one knew about.
11112.title: Dan and Paul have P.E.!

111123.content:
"Uhh....you got something in your shoe?" Paul asked Dan, the latter boy looked up in surprise. "Uhh...um...." He started to look nervous until Paul sighed and walked over to the bleachers with him. "C'mon, I'm too tired to bother with dodge ball.." Paul explained as Dan sat down next to him.

"So....ya got a rock in your shoe or something?" Paul inquired of his best friend.

"Uh...yeah something like that." Dan said, he probably would tell Paul after awhile...maybe a day or so. Paul frowned, "You're acting different...Did something happen?" He asked, concerned for his friend's safety.

Dan finally sighed, what the heck, he leaned down and untied his sneaker which held his puny slave. When his rancid socked foot popped out of the confines of the shoe, Paul held his nose. "Whew, stinky..." He joked.

Dan grinned smugly and began to peel his sock off, "Just think what HE'S going through."

"Who?" Paul asked as Dan propped his now bare foot up on his opposite knee, facing Paul. Paul admired Dan's young perfect boy foot as the bulbous toes wiggled and finally spread to reveal a large amount of funky build up.

Paul's eyes widened as he saw the miniscule form of none other than Ben between his best friend's big and second toe.

"Is that...Ben Darry?!" Paul said in shock. Dan nodded with a cocky smirk, "Yup, I got some weird power last night. Now he's just a bug in my toe cheese."
111123.title: They sit it out

choices: Continue after school at Dan's house
1111231.content:
"Dude that's awesome how...how the hell did you get him like this?' Paul asked, the smell of his best friend's rancid feet barely making him since anymore, while tiny Ben was sitting, shaking and trembling covered in thick teenage toe cheese.

"I shrunk him when we went into the bathroom, little fucker thought he could beat me up, didn't you?' Dan said mockingly down at the tiny teen between his nasty boyish toes, flexing them as the tiny boy cried out for mercy.

"No no no no please stop, your feet are fucking nasty, pl...please let me out". Ben begged, his once strong bravado melted away and he showed his true colors as a coward. His eyes growing wide as he looked up at the two nerds he used to pick on and pleaded with them for their mercy and his freedom.

"No fucking way dude, this is way too cool, has he been in your sneaker since then?' Paul asked, his attention fully on the bare foot of his best friend as the rest of their class played dodge-ball behind them.

"Yeah, and I'm not letting the little shit out until I get home". as he said that, Dan felt a little warmth down at his toes and burst into a geeky laugh as Paul giggled too "Dude, that little fucker just pissed himself". Making Ben blush bright red and casting his eyes down in shame and humiliation as the two boys casually chatted above him.

"Wow Dan, we could have so much fun with this, like him". he said calmly gesturing to their stern coach and both boys smirked and nodded their heads "Perhaps soon, I wanna see how fucked up little Benny here can get after a day on my shoes".

He chuckled before the coach blew his whistle and despite the pleading and screams of Ben between his toes, he pulled back on his sweat soaked sock and tied his rancid sneaker back onto his foot before standing up for the end of class.
1111231.title: "Dude that's awesome".

choices: Ben is forced to rub Dan's feet!
Ben has to eat his way out of the toejam!
11112311.content:
Paul and Dan rushed up the front stoop of the Gregory home, they had elected to walk from school and were sweating up a storm...just as planned. "Man! It's hot out today, huh buddy?" Paul said, wiping sweat from his brow.

Dan chuckled darkly and gave his toes a wiggle in his shoe, enjoying feeling how his sock felt like a second skin and his toes mooshed over the former bully within. "My feet are soaked, it's awesome!" Dan said, causing Paul to giggle as they entered into Dan's living room.

"I can't wait to watch you mess with Ben the bug!" Paul said excitedly. Paul and Dan shared a laugh at this, Dan's parents weren't home yet so the two boys flopped down on the couch and Dan began to remove his footwear.

"Time to unleash these bad boys!" Dan licked his lips as Paul watched his best bud's socked foot be revealed. The rancid sock clung to Dan's foot and it was visibly soaked in young boy sweat.

"Hahahaha! Look at him!" Paul lifted a finger and poked at the lump which was Ben Darry in the toes beneath the sock. The lump began to wiggle and let out a squeaky series of screams.

Dan grinned wickedly as Paul sniffed his finger and pretended to gag. "Heh, you ain't smelt nothin' yet!" Dan bragged before tearing off his sock to reveal his beautifully fleshy bare foot, lint scattered across his young sole and his toes clotted with grime.

"Whoa! Nice!" Paul complimented his friend's funk and fanned the air. Dan nodded smugly and removed his other shoe and sock, before slamming his feet on the coffee table propped up on their heels.

"It's nice to air out my GODLY feet..." Dan sighed as he wiggled his toes with a lot of wet sounds.

All the while, Ben was suffering the worst hell anyone could possibly imagine.Dan's huge sweaty toes trapped him and the toecheese and other funk trapped between his toes was surrounding him and covering him as the sweat and grime began to build up.

Feeling the giant boy walking was hell too, but he was protected by being between his toes and not under his sole or heel. He gulped as he felt the weight leaving him as the boys sat down as he felt the giant finger of Paul touching him through the sock, making him thrash around in disgust and terror before the shoes and socks were removed, he was momentarily blinded by the sudden light.

He gasped as he looked around and his situation was dire indeed as all he could see were huge teenage boy toes, soaked in sweat and he was soaked in it too, disgusted as he looked out and saw Paul's beaming young face looking in at his best friend's toes.

"Hey man, this is so cool, how'd you like a foot rub?' Paul asked his friend and Ben gulped as he heard the nerdy giggle of Dan "Sure thing man, that would be great".

Paul looked right down at Ben and this made the older teen wet himself in fear as the giant's finger scrapped him out from the toes, still covered in grime as he landed on the coffee-table with a grunt. "Hey you si...sick fucks, what do you think you are...."

He was interrupted by the booming voice of Paul as he smirked "Little Ben bug, start rubbing your Master's feet". he said down at Ben, making the tiny teen shudder as he looked up, gasping at the vast sole towering over him.

What does Ben do?

Ben Darry knew that running wasn't an option, and one look in the freckle faced nerd's deep green eyes and knew begging would get him nowhere. With a heavy sigh, the egotistical bully began to perform the task he couldn't have predicted he'd end up doing in a million years.

Up above, Dan's toes flexed joyfully as the young boy giggled at the feeling of Ben's tiny hands on his young flesh. "So, how's it feel?" Paul asked Dan.

"Really good!" Dan said blissfully as he leaned back against the couch, he could get used to this type of thing.

"It's only natural ya get foot rubs from puny mortals! You're a god afterall!" Paul laughed, adding to his best bud's ego.

Dan grinned smugly, "Bet ya wish ya never picked on me now huh, microbe?" His booming voice rattled Ben's ears.

Hesitantly Ben turned, and yelped as he fell on his butt at the sight of Paul's gargantuan face directly in front of him, wearing a wide toothy grin.

"I wonder how strong your foot stink is to him now?" Paul bellowed.

111123111111.content:
Dan and Paul were having a real blast as they were tormenting their former bully, who was currently shin deep in toe-jam and lint at the long, sweaty teenage toes of Dan. Both boys were leaning forward, their eyes were focused on the tiny pale teen between Dan's toes and their gaze pierced Ben's eyes, filling him with terror.

All of this, the thick horrendous smell, the gooey toe-jam surrounding him and the unending,harsh gaze of his former bullying victims was all too much for Ben. He wiped his mouth with the back of his hand and he heard a distant rumble and he went white with terror as his eyes slowly moved up the toes to the long legs and then to the pair of huge faces glaring down at him and he shuddered, wetting himself as warm piss trickled down his legs, adding insult to injury as the towering teens spoke.

"You filthy little maggot, you made a mess of my toes, well lets see how you enjoy what happens next for you". Dan thundered as Paul leaned in and he pushed Ben's little body down into the wads of thick toe-jam and his own vomit, without a hint of mercy.

Ben was a mess now as he struggled in the toe-jam/vomit mixture and he suddenly came to the surface, coated from head to heel in Dan's fungus as he screamed "N.....no please, I'll sorry, please I'll make it up to you, please I'll...
111123111111.title: Ben's Mistake

1111231111112.content:
Ben was now in tears. He has been reduced to just toy for these two brat-like teens to play with and degrade to the point of just wanting this all to end no matter what.

"I promise I'll do whatever you want from now on. I'll entertain you both however you want. I apologize for throwing up. My stomach is weak just like me compared to you both."

Ben's cracks were beginning to show and he was beginning to show submission and understanding his role compared to Dan and Paul. Dan cracked up at what Ben had just said and just squeezed his two toes tighter so that Ben was now gasping for breath and breathing in all the stink that surrounded him. Dan leaned over to Paul and whispered something into his ear which Paul laughed at. Ben had a knot in his stomach as he saw Paul get up from the couch and race up stairs while Dan just stared menacingly back at Ben. Dan leaned down and looked right at Ben...

"So you want to be our entertainment? Well I think that can be arranged. That might be a good start for having thrown up onto my godly toes."

Ben had no idea what Paul meant by that but it couldn't be anything good. Dan had all night with Paul apparently to have a sleepover and that meant an entire night that would probably be more painful, humiliating and torturous than anything he had endured during the day. Paul bounded down the stairs and back into the room with a childish grin on his face holding a box.

"I finally found it, Dan! That was such a great idea. I don't know why I didn't think of this sooner." Dan replied, "Yea I agree this is a perfect start to our sleepover for the evening and a great way to show Ben even more where his place is." Both boys just seemed itching to get going on whatever they had talked about and Ben could barely see what was going on with all the toe gunk that was all over his face. He tried to clear it from his face and suddenly saw what was written on the side of the box. "TWISTER"

Ben thought he was going to faint as Paul spread the floor mat out in the room. He thought to himself, "I'm too small to play this game myself but maybe I can just watch."

Paul then raced to one of the kitchen drawers and pulled out a roll of clear tape. He then came over...carefully removed Ben from Dan's toes (while making sure not to wipe off any of the toe jam) and taped him down in a line both hands above his head and both legs straight down on one of the red circles of the board.

Ben couldn't believe what was happening. He was becoming part of the board for them to just have fun with. He tried to wiggle free but it was clear that the tape was too strong at the size that he was. There was no escaping this. There was no doubt in Ben's mind that both Dan and Paul were going to make sure that they landed on his circle.

Dan announced that he would be going first. He put one of his dirty socks on his right foot and left his left foot bare. Paul did the same just for some variety. Dan spun the spinner and smiled down at Ben. Dan said "I just spun....
1111231111112.title: Obey from now on".

11112311111122.content:

Paul just laughed as Dan got into position and he grinned, his teeth bared down at little helpless Ben while he so calmly lifted his very sweaty left foot, which was bare and placed it down on top of Ben's body.

"Left hand on blue". He giggled as he placed his left hand on the blue circle and he glanced at Dan's bare foot, seeing the tiny movements of Ben underneath it, neither boy showing any mercy at all.

Meanwhile, Ben was having a really hard time as he screamed and was instantly engulfed in the thick sweaty sole of the teenage boy towering over him. He was pressed against the sole of his foot, which was oozing sweat all over him, making him feel sick again, but he trembled to think what would happen if he threw up again.

Unable to move, Ben was forced to endure this as Dan's foot held him in place and both boys were having a blast as they continued to play. While they were enjoying themselves, Dan suddenly giggled when he heard/felt Ben....

Dan just grinned in sheer satisfaction of what he was hearing. He just turned to Paul and laughed, "Can you believe this Paul? Did you think this day would ever come? This is going to be one of the best nights of our lives. Why don't you blow on Ben down there while ur resting on your hand and give him just a little bit of relief from all the smell haha."

Paul laughed and blew just ever so lightly on Ben to just let him get a chance for a bit of fresh air. "It's funny to hear you beg, Ben. You can beg all you want. But you made your choices and you are never going to live them down. There is no going back. You are going to be a footslave for life. Get used to it you can sob all you want."

Ben's dreams and hopes of just living a normal life seemed to shatter in front of him. The wind got knocked out of him as the ball of Dan's foot dug into his stomach and rib cage. Ben began to just sob uncontrollably. He felt trapped, hopeless and lost at the mercy of two teens who hated his guts. Dan seemed to enjoy hearing him sob and moved his foot to the side.

"Aww don't cry, Ben. It'll be okay. You can always have my foot to be your best friend." Dan said.

Paul leaned over, "Dude I can't tell where his tears end and where your foot sweat starts on his face. He is just covered in your foot sweat haha as if he just took a shower."

The game progressed and soon Dan had to reluctantly move his left foot off of Ben. Ben was relieved. 1111231111112222.content:
The look on Dan's face as he finished his spin made Ben's sweat soaked skin crawl and he watched, unable to move at all as he glanced around and watched, almost in slow-motion as Dan moved his body and his huge hand came slamming down onto the green circle. The sheet board shook slightly as Paul was in his positions on the board too and just giggled.

Looming overhead now, Dan grinned down at Ben's trapped little body and he licked his lips as he rolled his tongue around inside his mouth, collecting a large wad of spit in his jaws before turning to Paul. "Hey Paul, you remember when little Ben here pinned me down and spat in my mouth?"

Ben suddenly went white as a ghost as he heard this, his pathetic actions continued with renews vigor as he knew what was coming and sobbed for a way out. "No please, I'm sorry, please don't do this to me, I was wrong to treat you like that, be the better men than me".

Both Paul and Dan burst out laughing at this and Dan smirked before he loomed his big, soft boyish face over Ben and he pursed his lips and let a thick, gooey wad of saliva drool down and drop onto Ben. The terrified teen was now soaked, covered from head to heel on the spit of Dan.

In a vain effort to free himself, he was wriggling and to his horror, he could see the spit turning green as he was mixing with the toe-jam and foot sweat that covered him and he was making things so much worse for himself as he shivered in fear, looking up at the towering titans.
1111231111112222.title: Ben's spit-take

11112311111122221.content:
Ben looked up at Dan helpless. He had never felt this low and deprived before. He was covered in Dan's spit, toe jam and sweat unable to move. Dignity was something that Ben could only dream of at this point as he knew that he had absolutely none left thanks to these two teens. Ben felt defeated. He stopped struggling for the first time since he had gotten taped down as he knew that the energy used to try to free himself was just wasted energy. He needed to save that to try to escape whenever he could. Dan noticed that Ben had stopped trying to squirm.

"Aww Paul...it looks as though Ben has finally acceptable that he is now just a plaything for us. I think he realizes that he is in our world now and that he is nothing but a spot on a floor mat for us to step on. How cute!" If he didn't, he had a feeling the ball of Paul's socked foot would end up right on his face and that would no doubt be the end of him. All of a sudden as Ben kissed Dan's foot, Dan got really excited and his hand slipped from his circle. Dan fell onto the twister mat and the game was finally over. Paul had won the game and Dan had lost but Ben for some reason couldn't help but feel like the real loser of this situation.

"Scream for me little bitch, music for my ears". Paul grinned, showing off his white teeth as he very slowly peeled the tape off his tiny former bully. Much to Paul's delight, within seconds Ben was screaming as the sticky tape began to be removed, ripping out hairs and taking some skin with it as he was stripped of the tape.

"AAAAAAAHHHHH PLEASE MASTER, PLEASE NO MORE". Ben screamed, his voice high pitched, blind with panic as he felt his body violated by the tape as the giant teen removed it.

"Alright little runt, you said you were gonna do what you were told from now on, lets test that out, lay down and spread your arms and legs".

112.content:
Ben screamed as loud as he could as he felt Dan's once thin and weak fingers no encircle him and lift him up with remarkable ease. Locking the stall Dan grinned eagerly down at the 3 inch tall captive and licked his lips very slowly.

"Not so tough now are you little runt". Dan said, full of smug satisfaction as he finally could get his much desired revenge on his bully.

Ben's eyes went wide as he struggled, though still fully clothed, he felt so exposed and vulnerable in the thick coiled fist of his nerdy punching bag. As he screamed he caught a whiff of something acidic and potent and looked up, nervous as he saw the half dried pit stains beneath Dan's teenage armpits.

"O...o....Oh God, don't you ever wash your clothes nerd?" he snapped, doing his best to still seem big and tough as Dan simply smirked cruelly above him.

"Well i ran out of deodorant last week, and i think i just found a new one". He said as a wicked grin grew across his still boyish face and a sense of pure dread began to fill Ben. It slowly began to dawn on him what was going on as Dan calmly removed his t shirt, revealing his pale, bare chest with barley any sign of puberty on them at all.

He slowly lifted up his arm though, revealing a handful of dark black armpit hairs, all of them dripping with fresh teenage boy sweat and Ben recoiled in horror and disgust.

"No dude close your pits, that's fucking disgusting dude". He shouted, still fighting against the fingers that so easily held him as he was lifted closer to the stinking armpit. The closer he got, the more intense the smell got as his thin nose hairs were burning as soon as he was pressed against the soft sweaty skin.

His clothes instantly turned dark as they rapidly absorbed the sweat, making Ben feel even more disgusted as the smell invaded his every sense, his eyes stung, his ears rang with the sound of Dan's alarmingly calm and steady heartbeat.

"Now lets apply my new deodorant". The booming voice came from above as Ben glanced left and right as his face was pressed against the warm salty skin of the teenage giant that held him.

info.brief_description: Young Dan Gregory was given a special power, will he use it for good, or evil?
info.description:
Main Characters:

Dan Gregory: 14 years old, 5 foot 7 inches tall, wears size 10 shoe and has deep green eyes and sandy blonde hair with a handful of freckles.

Adam Gregory: 17 years old, 6 foot 2 inches tall, wears size 12 shoe and has green eyes and dark brown hair. Dan's older brother.

Paul Argon: 14 years old, 5 foot 9 inches tall. wears size 10 shoes and has blue eyes and blonde hair. Dan's best friend, spending most of his afternoons hanging out with Dan, as both enjoyed board and video games.

Potential Victims:

Ben Darry: 15 years old, 5 foot 11 inches tall, wears size 11 shoes and has brown eyes and jet black hair. He was the major bully of the classes that Dan and Paul attended at school, frequently giving both boys wedgies, swirlies and Chinese Burns.

Keith Barron: 39 years old, 6 foot 5 inches tall, wears size 13 shoes and has blue eyes and dark blonde hair. Headmaster of the school, often in conflict with the nerdier students since he was always the sporty type, despised their lack of physical prowess.

Harris Blackwood: 36 years old, 6 foot 4 inches tall, wears size 12 shoes and has brown eyes and hair. Gym coach of the school, he too despised the nerds as they were never as fit and athletic as the other students.
